Name: The Mirum
About the game: This is a first person puzzle game. The player will face a pocket fantasy world that was created by a wicked wizard. Enjoy the fairy tail atmosphere, investigate and explore the brand new world. Find the records of people stuck there before you. You are all alone there, no need to rush, take your time. Puzzles are consuming, and each has peculiarities. You don't know all secrets yet, but it you need to figure out the way back home. Use your mind.
